Title: Multi-Head Self-Attention Networks for Language Identification
Authors: RK Vuddagiri, HK Vydana, T Mandava, AK Vuppala
column9:
Self-attention networks are being popularly employed in sequence classification and sequence summarization tasks. State-of-the-art models use sequential models to
